title: 9/11: A Dark Day
description: 9/11: A Dark Day informs readers of events of September 11, 2001, when the United States suffered terrorist attacks that led to thousands of deaths and changes in national security. The text explains that four hijacked planes were used as missiles that day to crash into American landmarks. It describes who was responsible and how they were caught, as well as heroic efforts by rescue workers and civilians alike. The book also informs readers about the massive cleanup that was required as well as plans for future memorials and on-site buildings.
